explanatory.question: How does [person_3] run more comfortable?
answer: Because [person_3] can't afford to go to the gym.

predictive.question: What will happen to [person_3] after a while?
answer: [person_3] would probably pick it up later.
reason: There is no one else around.
Because the road here is too narrow.
Because there are many colors mixed.

counterfactual.question: What will happen if [person_1] faints out?
answer: [person_1] will not use the hand - held vacuum to clean the floor.
reason: [person_1] may keep trying to practice more to get stronger.
Because people will eat when he is hungry if he can.
The dance studio is out of power and it will become too dark to dance.
Because [person_1] isn't able to play baseball in dark.
